46453.「さすが ラセドに見込まれた方ね。\n 見事な出来の さんぞくのサーベルだわ。\:
Rasedo's prospective client. That's a
beautifully made Bandit Blade. This would be
perfect for her.

46454.「その息子は どこにいるかですって？\n ……ラセドも そこまでは 教えてないの:
And where is this son? Rasedo didn't tell you
that much, did he? No. If you want to know,
I'll tell you.

46455.「ラセドと私の息子…… ロゼフは\n ５年前 この光の河に落ち 命を落としたの。:
Rasedo and my son Roseph fell into this river
of light five years ago and lost his life. He
was only 10 years old.

46456.「それ以来 ラセドは 毎年の誕生日に\n あの子が生きていたら ちょうど合うだろ:
Since then, Rasedo has been making a weapon every year for his birthday that would fit just fine if the boy were still alive, and
giving it to him as a gift.

46457.「きっと ロゼフが 向こうで\n 困らないようにと 思ってのことでしょうね。\n:
I'm sure he wanted to make sure Roseph
wouldn't be in trouble over there. The boy was
unarmed...

46458.シェインは さんぞくのサーベルを\n光の河に 投げ落とした。:
Shane tossed his Bandit Blade into the river
of light.

46459.「こうして 毎年 あの子のために作った武器を\n 光の河へ投げ入れるのが 私たち:
This is the only mourning we can do, to throw
the weapons we made for him into the river of
light every year.

46460.「わざわざ ご足労様でした。\n 今の話を聞いて もし いやな思いを\n なさっ:
Thank you for coming all the way here. If you
had any bad feelings after hearing what I just
said, I am sorry.
